title:
Acronal Localization, Representations of the Causal Logic for massive
  systems
abstract:
On plain physical grounds localization of relativistic quantum particles is
extended to the acronal regions of Minkowski spacetime. Acronal localization
fulfills automatically the requirements of causality. It constitutes the frame
which complies most completely with the principle of causality for quantum
mechanical systems. Acronal localization is equivalent to the localization in
the regions of the causal logic. Representations of the causal logic are
constructed for the systems with mass spectrum of positive Lebesgue measure and
every definite spin. Apparently no representation of the causal logic for a
real mass system has been achieved in the past.
